sections.title: Components
items: Pull the latest library updates and resolve all deprecated items.
Connect all colors and spacings to tokens; test by switching variable modes.
Avoid detach and overrides; All elements must appear as purple frames in Outline Mode (⌘Y). Detach only if allowed explicitly in guidelines.
Use the correct component for each use case.
Define all assets and repeatable patterns as local components.

sections.title: Pages
items: Remove unnecessary libraries and keep only the Design System libraries.
Use device frame presets (375×812 for mobile, 1440×1024 for desktop).
Responsiveness – Apply autolayout and constraints for fluid resizing.

sections.title: Special Cases
items: System back – consider navigation for browser and OS backs specially in multi-layer flows (multi-step modals, navbar, tabular).
Error states – validation errors, server issues, network timeouts, plus offline states and retry options.
Empty and loading states – no data, first-time use.
Extreme states – long text overflow and text truncation (max-line).
